reviews.review: Saro sincero con tutti... Questo gioco ha una puzza di merda tremenda. Non vado contro gli skin e il marketing presente in esso ma contro la sua comunità che è fatta quasi tutta di imbecilli Russi (bambini che dicono parolacce in continuazione e insultano tua madre) e Hacker in alti ranghi e ciò non permette di giocare serenamente.
Oyun Güzel Ama Kasmaması İçin Biraz Uğraşabilirler

I have played this game quite a bit over the years i have owned it. I stopped playing around a year and half ago maybe even two years, even though you would think updates would make the game more enjoyable all it has seem to do is not make it feel like CS. When i look at the loading screen now it just doesn't feel the same. I still recommend it because even though all the downsides there is something about this particular game you can't get anywhere else.

Honestly, this game kind of sucks. There are times where you definitely were aiming at someones head, and the bullet doesn't register. There are other times where I shoot the enemy, blood comes out, and I don't do any damage.

Занятная игра для тех, кто ищет экшена. Но помимо самой увлекательности, она таит в себе много сопутствующих плюсов, благодаря которым есть возможность в дальнейшем и начать иметь какую-никакую благосостоятельность, а то и основной доход. Игру рекомендую)
